title: Connectivity Needs Assessment
scope: Conduct stakeholder interviews in Acholi and Karamoja, document connectivity pain points, and deliver prioritised requirements.
acceptanceCriteria: Approved research report with prioritised requirements signed off by MTN product lead.

title: Data Platform Prototype
scope: Deliver first version of rural hub analytics platform with live tower telemetry and outage alerts.
acceptanceCriteria: Deployed prototype accessible via MTN sandbox with documented API endpoints.

title: Farmer Data Pipelines
scope: Integrate three cooperatives into UBL analytics stack with automated data quality checks.
acceptanceCriteria: Daily ingestion jobs running with less than 1% missing records for partner cooperatives.

title: Coverage Data Model
scope: Deliver predictive coverage model combining Airtel tower, demand and population datasets.
acceptanceCriteria: Model accuracy above 85% on validation dataset with documented variables.

title: Cashflow Dashboard MVP
scope: Build interactive SME cashflow dashboard with dfcu data connectors and SME personas.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard vetted by Stanbic mentor and two pilot SMEs.

title: Mobility Pass Pilot
scope: Launch SafeBoda campus mobility pass at Makerere and Kyambogo with live usage analytics.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 500 validated trips recorded in analytics dashboard with feedback survey summary.

title: Traceability App Beta
scope: Deploy mobile app to three UCDA cooperatives and train enumerators on offline data capture.
acceptanceCriteria: Enumerators submit at least 150 verified records with geotagged deliveries.

title: Hackathon Insights Dashboard
scope: Aggregate historical hackathon data, craft performance metrics, and design dashboard templates for Outbox.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard with at least five KPIs reviewed by Outbox programme manager.

title: Energy Portfolio Health Monitor
scope: Build repayment health dashboards for Fenix agent success teams with automated alerts.
acceptanceCriteria: Agent success teams can view repayment risk tiers updated daily.

title: Training & Handover
scope: Train MTN operations team on smart rural hub dashboards and deliver maintenance playbooks.
acceptanceCriteria: Training attendance above 90% with signed handover checklist.
